member.office_address: Athens University of Economics and Business Main Building, Derigny ct, 3rd fl
member.shortcv: Giorgos Gousios is a PhD candidate at the Athens University of Economics and Business. He holds a Diploma in Information and Communication Systems Engineering from the University of the Aegean and an MSc in Advanced Computer Science from the University of Manchester. He is a former member of the APT group (Manchester University) and a current member of the SENSE group. He has contributed code in various open source projects. His research interests include programming language theory, software engineering and operating system architectures.
